name: WhisperSRTube
description: A subtitling tool I made because I found Youtube's current auto-translation and captioning to be temperamental at best. Built with Python on Tkinter.

name: AI-ccess
description: An experimental project on how machine learning can be used to improve web accessibility. Note that the project structure is ambiguous and lacks clear client-server delineation; currently being refactored on a repo branch to learn how to align with cloud-native best practices. Built with Python on FastAPI and Flask.

name: EDA-Ottawa-Traffic
description: Nokia EDA (Event Driven Automation) platform enables its users to get real-time data w/o configuring any networking infrastructure. I am exploring the playground EDA toolkit filtering public Ottawa traffic data flows into a stack powered by Azure data processing services, Grafana and Kafka.

name: AliceYangFolio
description: This landing page! Built with Python on Flask and deployed on Render.
